name: ringID-Live Doctor, Live Stream, Live TV & Chat
description: ringID is your go-to-app for all the features you love in one place!   Download ringID now for experiencing a platform that makes socializing complete with music & media management and an exciting platform to broadcast yourself to the worldwide audience using Live.  Show your hidden talent by broadcasting LIVE to millions of viewers worldwide. Dont just limit yourself to calling, chatting, and browsing through an irrelevant newsfeed clattered with ads use less data & battery on calls and customize the newsfeed to create your own personalized newsfeed.   App that packs a powerful punch into a small mobile package- Forbes.  Exclusive Features  Live:   ringID Live is your platform to broadcast yourself to the world. Host a live video for others to enjoy & call a viewer to co-host your live broadcast. A great new feature to broadcast live from anywhere & at any time using your mobile phone. Show off your personality & share your story by broadcasting your hobbies, your skills and exciting events. Meet new people by chatting and direct video calling and gain followers. Earn redeemable gifts from your viewers and claim exciting rewards.  Channel:   Channel brings all your favorite video content right on your mobile. Follow your favorite movies, music, and other interests. Find popular channels by categories or maintain your very own channel. Create your own channel and stream content for others to enjoy. Broadcast your content and gain followers anywhere & everywhere.   Voice & Video Call:   Enjoy free calls with flawless voice quality and smooth video resolution on 3G, Wi-Fi or even 2G connections. Feel the warmth of a real conversation in the virtual world!   Secret Chat:   Dont just send pictures that disappear, set the timer to self-destruct any message including text, image, audio and video. Its an exciting way to share instant messages that disappear from the chat history, automatically!  Features - Voice Calls: Got it! - Video Calls: Yup! - Chat: Of course! We even have Secret Chat.  - Stickers: Got tons of them! - Newsfeed: Yes! - Multimedia Sharing: Oh Yes!  Media Cloud:   Cant find the music/video that you saw on your newsfeed from a week ago? Now you can add music & video from the newsfeed to your own playlist and you can even download them to be viewed when offline. A truly effective media management system for all your social media  Message Retrieval:   Avoid that embarrassing oops moment by deleting your sent message at any time! Make sure the message that was not meant to be seen, is erased forever.   NewsPortal:   Select your preferred news providers to bring all your preferred daily news in one convenient place. Discover news providers from across the World Wide Web and choose your favorites to get all your trusted news on a separate feed.  You will love to discover all the exciting new features that are introduced & the many benefits through your ringID experience. ringID brings all the popular features bundled into one power packed & easy to use app!  Get to know more by visiting our website: www.ringid.com.
